tagline: Structured onboarding that turns 'you're hired' into 'I belong here' in 90 days
pros: 30/60/90-day programs tailored to role and team
Remote onboarding that doesn't feel remote
Early warning detection for struggling new hires
Continuous improvement from new hire feedback
cons: Needs organizational buy-in for buddy programs
Designs the experience, doesn't own the tools or access provisioning
Can over-structure when a lighter touch would do

model_recommendations.notes: Prioritizes voice, tone, and creative quality over analytical depth. Thinking/reasoning can hurt creative output — keep low or off.
